desc: Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company based in New Jersey. Limited public information available.
Alternative financing company founded in 2020, based in King of Prussia, PA. Provides sales-based financing and merchant cash advances to small businesses, with funding often within 24 hours.
Small business lending company based in Texas. Limited public information available.

Revenue-based financing platform for bootstrapped SaaS founders, founded by Nathan Latka in 2019 in Austin, TX. Raised $145M in debt and equity, deployed over $200M to 500+ founders, offering non-dilutive capital based on recurring revenue.

Specialty finance company founded in 2006 in San Francisco, CA. Provides equipment lease capital and manages private credit funds, offering sale-leaseback and venture/expansion stage leasing with investments ranging from $250K to $25M.

Working capital provider founded in 2017, headquartered in New Haven, CT. Offers fast, flexible funding from $20K to $350K for small and medium businesses, with approvals in 2-4 hours and same-day funding available.
Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available.
Small business lender providing lines of credit, bridge loans, and MCAs from $5K to $2.5M with A+ BBB rating. Offers 24-hour approvals with no upfront costs.

Revenue-based financing company founded in 2020 by Efraim Kandinov and Natasha Dillon, headquartered in New York. Provides merchant cash advances to small and medium businesses across the US and Canada, with credit facility expansions in 2025.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company based in Delaware. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Online business funding marketplace headquartered in Orange County, CA. Connects businesses with multiple loan operators for business loans, lines of credit, MCAs, and equipment financing with short-term loans from 1-24 months.

Alternative financing company based in NYC and Miami offering revenue-based financing for small businesses. BBB A+ rated with minimum $5K monthly revenue requirement and funding in as little as 24 hours.
Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available online.

Private direct funding company in Fort Lauderdale, FL, founded by experienced small business owners with 30+ years combined experience. Offers business cash advances and Business Advance Lines based on monthly revenue, funding in as little as 24 hours.

Business financing company founded in 2014 by Rudy Bensimon, headquartered in Miami, FL. Provides working capital, MCAs, SBA loans, equipment finance, and invoice factoring from $20K-$200K with same-day approval.
California and Vietnam-based fintech focused on solving the working capital problem for SMEs. Subsidiary eLoan operates a P2P funding marketplace in Vietnam. Closed $30M in financing for eLoan.
Small business lending company based in Virginia. Limited public information available.
Asset-based lender founded in 2008, providing senior-secured commercial loans from $1M-$10M to small and mid-size businesses in the US and Canada. Holds a California Finance Lender license.

Online MCA funder based in Miami, FL, co-founded by Michael Zevallos and Jared Kogan. Offers revenue-based financing up to $10K ($20K for repeat customers) for gig workers and small businesses in under 8 minutes, using bank data instead of credit scores.

Invoice financing and asset-based lending provider based in Chattanooga, TN. Programs up to $2M including invoice factoring, asset-based lines of credit, contract financing, and government contracting (GovCon) support for small businesses.
Impact investment organization based in Georgia, associated with Emory University's Goizueta Business School. May be defunct (0 employees).
Capital equipment financing and leasing company based in Florida with 14+ years of experience. Provides funding from $10K to $1M for businesses across the United States.
Equipment financing solutions provider based in Kansas. Offers custom lending solutions designed to preserve working capital for small businesses looking to acquire equipment.

Online lending platform founded in 2015 by Seke Ballard in Seattle, WA. Provides small business loans to state-licensed cannabis companies, including term loans, revolving credit lines, and CRE loans, averaging $75K per loan.

Working capital provider headquartered in Melville, NY. Provides flexible funding for small businesses with upfront underwriting, specializing in trucking and construction businesses with maximum funding of $1M and 4-12 month terms.

Direct MCA lender established in 2016, based in Brooklyn, NY. Has funded over $150M in business advances across all 50 states, offering working capital advances, business credit lines, equipment financing, and cash advance consolidation. BBB Accredited.

National financing company founded in Brooklyn, NY, with a network of over 100 lending partners. Provides small business equipment funding, lines of credit, and cash advance solutions with 24-hour funding and flexible approval criteria.

Direct financing company based in Berlin, CT, providing working capital to small businesses nationwide. Offers fast, flexible funding with next business day deposits, no credit impact from applying, and multiple funding options.

Fintech company founded in 2018 in Delray Beach, FL, specializing in digital trade finance for SMEs. Offers supply chain finance, receivables finance, and inventory finance. Raised $7.5M and expanded to Mexico in 2022.

Los Angeles-based provider of invoice factoring and AR financing for small businesses and startups. Offers funding from $25K to $5M with factoring rates from 1%, approvals within 48 hours, serving tech, media, transportation, and entertainment industries.

Lender finance company launched in 2018 by Stan Vukmer, backed by Halstatt family office. Provides senior and junior credit facilities up to $25M to factors, asset-based lenders, and specialty finance companies. Closed $45M credit facility with First Horizon Bank.

MCA company founded in 2017, headquartered in New York. Advances up to $250K by purchasing future sales, with ACH debits from business checking. Previously affiliated with Yellowstone Capital entities; involved in $27.4M settlement over alleged predatory lending practices.
Equipment finance and leasing company based in Minnesota, part of the True North Family of Companies. Seeks to disrupt business lending with responsiveness, speed, and innovation.
Small business financing company founded in 2014, based in New York. Offers merchant cash advances, business loans, and lines of credit up to $1M with quick turnaround times.
Boutique MCA funder founded in 2018, based in Brooklyn, NY. Provides merchant cash advance financing to small businesses.

Fintech direct lender based in NYC providing working capital up to $500K to US-based small and medium businesses. Offers MCA programs, streamlined application process with pre-approval within 3 hours and funding in as little as one day.

Technology-driven MCA provider founded in 2011, based in Woodland Hills, CA. Direct funder providing merchant cash advances, small business loans, and working capital solutions to small and mid-size businesses for over 13 years.

Short-term working capital provider based in Mt. Pleasant, SC. Offers flexible funding from $5K-$500K with no long-term contracts, advancing funds against progress payments, POs, and contracts in as little as 48 hours.

MCA company based in New York specializing in merchant cash advance programs for US small business owners. Offers underwriting approval in as little as 2 hours with same or next day funding, specializes in 2nd through 6th position offers.
Business funding provider based in Miami, FL, offering $10K-$500K in funding. Works with businesses to provide cash infusions and debt elimination solutions, with flexible credit requirements.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
Small business lending company based in Texas. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Bank alternative working capital and equipment financing provider based in Corpus Christi, TX. Privately funded, offers cash flow-based loans up to $500K underwritten using bank statements, with 90% approval rate and 48-hour turnaround.
Small business lending company based in New York. Limited public information available.

AI-powered online lending marketplace founded in 2016, based in Plantation, FL. Offers MCA, line of credit, equipment financing, and invoice factoring. Also provides white-label SaaS lending platforms (E-Lender, E-Broker) for financial institutions and brokers.

NYC-based working capital provider operating since 2009. Offers advances against future business receivables from $10K to $5M with 4-18 month repayment terms. Simple one-page application with 3 months of bank statements, no collateral required.
Small business funding company based in New York providing merchant cash advances and various funding programs. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
Direct in-house MCA funder based in New York. Provides financing up to $750K with approval within 2 hours and same-day funding for small businesses nationwide.

Alternative lending company founded in 2020, based in Chicago, IL. Offers MCA, term loans, lines of credit, equipment financing, invoice factoring, SBA loans, and consolidation services for small and mid-sized businesses.
Financial services company based in Massachusetts providing loans, funds, and financial advice to small businesses.

MCA company founded in 2014, headquartered in NYC. Provides working capital through merchant cash advances and unsecured loans for small businesses, including those with bad credit, with 24-hour approvals across hundreds of industries.

Medical lien funding company founded in 1996, based in Westlake Village, CA. National leader providing medical funding for personal injury patients and providers, working with 14,000+ attorneys and 10,000+ physicians. Backed by Parthenon Capital Partners.
Invoice factoring marketplace for SMEs, launched in 2015 in California. Connects companies with investors to buy invoices for quick cash. May be defunct (0 employees).

Florida-based business funding company (Pizan Consulting LLC) in Miami, offering SBA term loans, lines of credit, equipment financing, and unsecured business financing across all 50 states and Puerto Rico. Reports 90% deal success rate.
MCA marketplace founded in 2018 in NYC, specializing in micro-advances from $1.5K to $50K+. Offers approval in minutes with same-day funding, 12-point broker commissions, and 7-day customer support.
Small business lending company based in Georgia. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
Small business lending company based in New York. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
Small business lending company based in New York. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
DSCR loan provider based in New York, specializing in financing solutions for real estate investors and small business owners. Offers non-qualified mortgage lending with extensive DSCR product suite.

MCA provider founded in 2013, headquartered in New York (operates as Legend Advance Funding II LLC). Offers merchant cash advances up to $750K based on revenue and cash flow, with FICO scores as low as 500 accepted.
Commercial funding solutions provider based in New York. Offers various business funding products including MCA, hiring ISO and telemarketer sales reps.
Small business lending company based in New York. Limited public information available.

Swiss crowdlending platform founded in 2016, based in Nyon, Switzerland. Connects borrowers and investors for personal loans, with 1,500+ investors and CHF 5M+ financed. Not a US small business lender.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Fixed-rate small business loan provider founded in 2021, based in Glendale, AZ. Provides fixed rate loans and financial solutions to SMBs with quick approvals and flexible terms. Expanding internationally to India.
SBA franchise lending specialist based in New York. Helps franchisees with SBA loan applications, pre-qualification in 24 hours, business plans, and financial projections.

Revenue-based financing company based in Hollywood, FL, serving businesses across the US. Offers quick business finance through purchasing future receivables, evaluating sales performance and bank activity rather than credit history. Rated 4.9/5 on Google.

Direct MCA lender based in Garden City, NY, operating since approximately 2019. Provides business funding including startup funding, lines of credit, invoice financing, equipment loans, and merchant cash advances.
Tennessee-based underwriting firm helping brokers nationwide secure fast, reliable business funding through merchant cash advances.

Business line of credit marketplace connecting small businesses with 60+ small-business-friendly banks. Streamlines the application process to a single 10-minute form for revolving business lines of credit.
Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Private lending and investment firm based in Los Angeles, CA. Provides short-term asset-backed real estate loans (1st and 2nd deed) secured by income properties. Operates in AZ, CA, NV, OR, UT, and WA.

Alternative lending company founded in 2015, based in Queens, NY. Offers MCA, revenue-based financing, lines of credit, equipment financing, term loans, and credit card processing, with funding from $5K to $500K in as little as 24 hours.

Fintech company based in Massachusetts offering flexible lines of credit and bill pay services for small businesses. Fast online application with same-day approval and funding, soft credit pull only, no minimum FICO required. Also offers MCA syndication for investors.

Chicago-based technology-enabled lender founded in 2014 providing structured loans up to $10M to SMBs in under 30 days. Uses proprietary LQD Matrix risk management software. Offers working capital, acquisition financing, AR financing, and equipment financing.
MCA provider based in New York offering business cash advances. Purchases future receivables from credit/debit card sales or revenue deposits, with flexible repayment tied to daily sales volume.

Alternative business funding company established in 2014, based in Davie, FL. Provides MCA, lines of credit, invoice factoring, and working capital loans from $3K to $500K to businesses across the US, Puerto Rico, and Canada.
Small business lending company based in California. Limited public information available.
MCA funding platform based in Brooklyn, NY, founded in 2021. Provides merchant cash advances for quick capital access, requiring only 3 months of bank statements and a simple application.
Merchant cash advance provider based in New York. Offers business cash advances to small businesses seeking fast working capital.

MCA funder based in Suffern, NY, operating since 2021. Known for funding B-C paper deals and aggressive D paper terms, up to $5M per file. Funds almost all industries (except used auto) in all states except Puerto Rico.
Merchant cash advance company. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Technology-driven platform based in Stamford, CT connecting businesses, brokers, ISOs, and investors with alternative funding. Offers MCA, lines of credit, equipment financing, and credit-builder programs. Also provides syndication and investment opportunities.
Small business lending company based in New York. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Revenue advance company based in Exton, PA. Purchases future business sales at a discount in exchange for immediate capital, with daily or weekly repayment tied to actual sales. No personal asset encumbrance required. Bank-owned so exempt from certain regulations.
Business financing company based in New York offering business loans and real estate financing solutions nationwide with A+ BBB rating. Also operates broker referral program.

Working capital provider based in Miami, FL, with 30+ years combined management experience. Has helped over 15,000 businesses with funding for equipment, marketing, and inventory needs, with 24-hour turnaround.
Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available.

AI-powered SMB lending platform based in Austin, TX, founded by Frank Estrada. Connects underserved entrepreneurs and minority-owned businesses with lenders using alternative data, focusing on financial inclusion, fraud reduction, and cross-border payments.

Private equity MCA firm co-founded in 2019 by Zain Razvi, based in Miami, FL. Funded $10M in deals in first 18 months. Offers merchant cash advances up to $1M with 18-month terms, requiring only 3 months of bank statements.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available.
Likely a duplicate of Moneywell GRP (id 1318). Small business lending company based in Florida.
Africa-focused fintech company based in California. Limited public information available for US small business lending; may be defunct (0 employees).
Small business financing company based in California. Provides merchant cash advances and business financing solutions.

Business funding and PR/marketing services company based in Boca Raton, FL. Offers business term loans, property refinance, same-day working capital, SBA loans, equipment loans, MCA, and factoring for US and Canadian businesses.
Small business loan company based in Oregon. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).
Small business lending company based in Virginia. Limited public information available.

Digital lending platform based in California connecting veteran-owned and minority-owned SMBs with community banks and credit unions. Uses AI-powered application assistance for grants, loans, and investor funding.
California-based financing company helping small and mid-sized businesses grow with personalized, fast funding solutions. Operates in the San Diego area.

Boutique private lender based in Port St Lucie, FL specializing in commercial vehicle loans from $15K to $250K. Direct lender using own funds, dedicated to owner-operators and small family-owned trucking companies, financing credit scores as low as 600.

New Bridge Merchant Capital, based in New Jersey. Provides MCA funding up to $2.5M with no collateral required, plus lines of credit and term loans. Management team has 20+ years of financial industry experience. Approval and funding within 24 hours.

Next-gen fintech founded in 2016 by Albert Periu and Thomas Meister (ex-Funding Circle). Commercial lending platform for mid-market businesses ($10M-$100M revenue) with loans up to $60M. Acquired by Zilch in 2021. Raised $13M total.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees, no website).
Small business funding company providing fast cash through customized financing and repayment programs, with working capital up to $500K and same-day funding with minimal paperwork.

Alternative financing company (formerly Fundamental Capital) with offices in Aventura, FL and Garden City, NY. Provides MCA, line of credit, factoring, and revenue-based loans with 95%+ approval rate. Funding within 24 hours for businesses with $10K+ monthly revenue.
Likely a duplicate of Nexi (id 1332). Nexi Finance, formerly Fundamental Capital LLC, same company with offices in Florida. Provides alternative lending solutions for small businesses.

Business lender based in Boca Raton, FL with A+ BBB rating. Offers 3-5 year term loans starting at 8.99% from $100K and up, including asset-based lending, invoice factoring, and MCA refinancing. Has funded over $500M nationwide.

Working capital solutions provider based in St. Petersburg, FL, founded in 2015. Offers lines of credit, term loans, and invoice factoring from $3K to $6M with 4-24 month terms. Same-day approvals and no hard credit pull.

National Private Lenders Association Conference â€” the largest nonbank real estate lending conference in the US, serving the industry for 20+ years. Trade organization for private lenders focused on legislation, education, and community building. Not a lending company.

California-based fintech providing a digital lending platform for SMEs in carbon removal, ecosystem restoration, and sustainable commodities. Helps financial institutions assess risk using alternative data and innovative algorithms.

Cleveland, OH-based invoice factoring company founded in 2013 serving digital media and advertising firms. Buys publisher invoices at 80-90% value upfront, taking collection risk. Serves ad tech companies, agencies, mobile SSPs, ad networks, and podcast networks.
Small business lending company based in Salt Lake City. Limited public information available under this exact name; may be related to Olympus Lending (id 1340).

Business financing company founded in 2013, based in Salt Lake City, UT. Offers term loans, invoice factoring, equipment financing, and MCA products without credit checks. Next business day funding available, minimum $5K monthly revenue required.
Small business lending company based in Florida. Limited public information available.

Business financing company headquartered in Irvine, CA (despite listed as Arizona). Provides unsecured lines of credit from $25K-$500K, asset-based loans, invoice factoring, and merchant cash advances.
Income-based funding company based in Delray Beach, FL. Offers industry and income-tailored programs with human-driven 1:1 approval process, fast response times, and hassle-free applications.

Canadian-based business finance company founded in 2019 in Concord, Ontario. Provides MCA, bridge financing, property loans, and lines of credit to Canadian and American businesses, with funding within 24 hours and daily/weekly/bi-weekly repayment options.
Small business lending company based in New York. Limited public information available; may be defunct (0 employees).

Commercial financing consultant founded in 2022, based in NYC. Provides structured credit facilities from $250K to $50M+ for working capital, acquisitions, and special situations. Has funded $350M+ across 120+ businesses in the US, Canada, Europe, and Australia.

MCA provider based in New York using data analytics and digital technology to assess small business creditworthiness. Pioneered use of data-driven rapid underwriting for convenient online financing access.
